tool_description: Create and manage time-based reminders with natural language time parsing. Reminders persist across sessions and notify proactively when due.

available_commands.description: Create a new reminder with natural language time specification
List all active reminders sorted by scheduled time
Delete a specific reminder by ID
Clear a specific reminder (alias for delete)

tool_usage_guidance: Use reminders when user says 'remind me to...' or asks to remember something later
Natural time phrases supported: 'in X minutes/hours/days', 'tomorrow at Xpm', 'next monday at Xam'
Examples: 'in 5 minutes', 'in 2 hours', 'in 3 days', 'tomorrow at 3pm', 'next monday at 10am'
Reminders persist across agent restarts and system shutdowns
Overdue reminders are sent to your thought buffer immediately on startup
Every 30 minutes, you'll receive notifications about reminders due in the next 30 minutes
If no reminders are due soon, you'll see the next 3 upcoming reminders
Overdue reminders are sent up to 3 times, then automatically removed
After notifying the user about a reminder, use reminders.delete to clear it
Use reminders.list proactively when user asks about their reminders
proactive_triggers: When user asks 'what are my reminders' or 'do I have any reminders'
When user mentions needing to remember something later
When you receive overdue reminder notifications in thought buffer
Every 30 minutes for upcoming reminders (automatic background check)

metadata.notes: Refactored for tool control system with proactive 30-minute notifications and automatic expiration after 3 notifications
